question: Please help!!!  I have gestational diabetes so I am getting serial ultrasounds, everything has been ok until no .  I am 26.5 weeks pregnant, today docotor told me that the ventricle in the brain is supposed to me 10mm and my baby's is 10.9 mm.  He did not see that on the previous 3 usgs.  My downs screen was negative at 12 weeks and rest of the baby is fine with no other anamolies detected.  I am 35 years old now and the baby is a male child.  Is this of concern?  he asked me to follow up in 3 weeks.  Should I have them do some thing early like MRI I have been reading about?  Does it matter that so far ( ever 4 weeks back) it was normal and now it is not...?  I am terrified.  My husband is out of country and I am not sure how to deal with this.Help if any one knows more
title: mild ventriculomegaly
